metadata.name: Aquamarine
metadata.description:
Currently, 90% of the world's aquamarine is extracted from the Brazil making the country the largest producer of this beautiful stone

It has a color that is very similar to ocean water and can varies in shade of blue.
The stone was used by sailors as a protection talisman during battle and at sea and for good luck.

Aquamarine has a special connection to the Throat Chakra and can help to improve communication. 
A great amount of positive energy comes from this stone and that increases the ability to talk publicly because it helps with self-confidence

Mystics believe that the stone strengthens fidelity and true.

March birth stone. 

Aquamarine is the stone for 19th wedding anniversary.
